page.title: 06NICHOLFOREST PUBLIC HALL
page.content: The community hall is Nicholforest Public Hall.Consists of a main hall with stage,a supper room,kitchen and toilets. The Hall is administered by a committee of 21 drawn from the parish. Representatives are from the church,Parish Council,Women's Institute and Youth Club. A Chairperson,Secretary and Treasurer are elected annually from the Committee.They look after the upkeep and running of the Hall.Anyone may hire the Hall on a fixed letting basis.The Education Authority hire sessions for the Nursery Service and for School use.The W.I. Bowling Club,Youth Club are also regular users.Also hired for weddings,Whist Drives,Coffee Evenings,Concerts,Domino Drives & c. The Hall is a registered charity.This is an important resource.
